Classes module¶

class src.classes.Alignment(score, query_residues, template_name, template_residues)[source]¶
class Alignment¶

This class groups informations about an alignment.

score¶

Score of the alignment

query_residues¶

Query’s sequence of residues as list of Residues objects

template¶

Instance of a Template object as Template(template_name, template_residues)

class src.classes.Residue(name)[source]¶
class Residue¶

This class groups informations about a residue.

name¶

Name of the residue (1 letter code)

ca_coords¶

3D coordinates of the residue

class src.classes.Template(name, residues)[source]¶
class Template¶

This class groups informations about a template sequence/structure.

name¶

Name of the template

residues¶

Template’s sequence of residues as list of Residues objects

pdb¶

PDB code of the template

get_all_ca_coords()[source]¶

Parse the PDB file and sets the coordinates of the residues list of the current template.

Parameters:self – The current alignment’s template.
Returns:void
get_pdb(metafold_dict)[source]¶

Get the PDB file name of the current template from the template’s name.

Parameters:
  • self – The current alignment’s template.
  • dictionary – A dictionary with key = template name and value = pdb file
Returns:

void
